name: symbol-navigation-tools
description: Tool to enable LLMs to navigate your codebase and modules / packages more effectively.

languageModelTools.name: go-to-definition
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Navigate to the definition of a symbol in the codebase and installed modules / packages.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Find the definition of a symbol in the codebase and installed modules / packages.

symbol.description: The symbol to find the definition for.

uri.description: The VSCode URI of the document where the symbol is defined (e.g., absolute path to file).

startLineNumber.description: The starting line number of the context (1-based).

endLineNumber.description: The ending line number of the context (1-based).

languageModelTools.name: get-document-symbols
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Retrieve all document symbols in a file.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get a nested list of all symbols in the current document.

uri.description: The VSCode URI of the document for which to retrieve symbols (e.g., absolute path to file).

maxDepth.description: The maximum depth of symbol nesting to retrieve.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
